title: Apple has reportedly hired a Ford veteran with 30 years of experience
content:
For several years, we have heard rumors on and off about Apple developing some sort of electric vehicle. While we have yet to see any physical proof of its existence, there have been plenty of reports about the people involved. Today, a new report attaches auto industry veteran Desi Ujkashevic to the Apple project. According

The post Apple has reportedly hired a Ford veteran with 30 years of experience appeared first on XDA.
description: If a new report is to be believed, Apple has hired Ford veteran Desi Ujkashevic. Ujkashevic has over three decades of experience in the auto industry.
